Get Started
  1. Home
  2. Flagship Program

Flagship Program

Curated Programs For The Modern Tech Era.

Certified Agentic and Robotic AI Engineer

Embark on a transformative journey into the realm of Agentic Artificial Intelligence (AI) with our comprehensive program. Agentic AI refers to autonomous systems capable of making decisions and performing tasks without human intervention, revolutionizing industries by enhancing efficiency and innovation.

View Offered Courses
View Certifications

Program Structure

The program spans one year, with flexibility to accelerate completion by enrolling in multiple courses per quarter. This program equips you with the skills to thrive in the age of Conversational, Generative, Agentic, and Physical AI. It is divided into two levels:

Core Level

Foundation for AI professionals

Focuses on foundational concepts, enabling you to start working in the field upon completion.

Fundamental AI concepts and applications
Practical implementation skills
Industry-ready portfolio projects

Professional Level

Advanced specialization

Delves into advanced topics, allowing you to continue your studies while gaining practical experience.

Specialized AI domains and techniques
Advanced implementation strategies
Industry mentorship and networking
Interactive Learning Path

Your Learning Journey

From foundational knowledge to startup creation, follow our structured path to mastering AI and Python development.

1

Develop and Share Open-Source Textbooks

Create up-to-date, comprehensive textbooks on modern AI and Python, hosted on GitHub for global access and collaboration.

2

Learn from Panaversity Teaching Agents

Agents are under development which will interact with you and teach and monitor your progress.

3

Engage with Certification Quizzes

Design Level 1 and Level 2 quizzes based on the textbooks, hosted on GitHub. All students begin their journey by taking the Level 1 Certification exam to build foundational knowledge.

4

Foster Practical Skills through Hackathons

Organize monthly, day-long hackathons focused on agentic AI development, enabling students to build robust project portfolios and gain real-world experience.

5

Achieve Agentic AI Certification

Ensure all students and faculty members earn certifications to validate their skills and knowledge.

6

Launch Startups with Mentorship

Guide senior students to become startup founders, working directly under Zia Khan's mentorship to develop and launch professional projects in the global marketplace.

What You'll Learn

Master the technologies that will shape the future of AI and robotics

Program Modules

Agentic Systems

Agentic Systems

Master the design and orchestration of AI agents to perform complex tasks, leveraging frameworks for intelligent automation and collaboration.

Start with OpenAI Responses API and Agents SDK, progressing to advanced multi-agent frameworks for scalable solutions.

Key Skills You'll Develop

  • Agent Orchestration
  • Multi-Agent Collaboration
  • Process Automation

Tools & Technologies

OpenAI Agents SDK
AutoGen
LangChain

Our Progressive Teaching Approach

Panaversity's innovative strategy for effective learning

Foundation Building

Start with the fundamentals of Agentic AI, including OpenAI Responses API and Agents SDK. Build a solid conceptual base in multi-agent systems, cloud-native architecture, and intelligent dialogues—the foundation of the Agentia era.

Practical Application

Apply your knowledge through hands-on projects focused on designing and deploying AI Agents. Work with real-world use cases in multi-agent orchestration, knowledge graphs, and cloud-based agentic systems.

Specialization

Dive deeper into vertical LLM agents, Physical AI, and humanoid robotics. Choose from advanced topics aligned with your career goals—ranging from distributed AI systems to BDD-driven AI solution design.

Industry Integration

Collaborate with industry partners through capstone projects, internships, and real-world deployments. Start freelancing or contributing to live agentic systems while continuing your professional-level coursework.

Imagine A World Where Everything Is An AI Agent

A future where intelligent systems seamlessly collaborate, learn, and evolve to create a more connected and responsive world.

Ubiquitous Intelligence

Smart homes, autonomous vehicles, adaptive businesses, and responsive urban infrastructure all functioning as independent yet collaborative intelligent agents.

Agentic Communication

REST APIs become obsolete, replaced by fluid, context-aware agent-to-agent conversations using advanced Large Language Models.

Physical Embodiment

Digital intelligence meets physical reality through humanoid robots and Physical AI to interact naturally with humans and the physical world.

Intelligent Dialogues

Agents engage in deep, meaningful interactions, comprehending context, intent, nuance, and complexities far beyond basic endpoint invocations.

Why This Program?

Cutting-Edge Skills: Stay ahead in the rapidly evolving tech landscape by mastering in-demand skills to build and deploy intelligent, scalable Agentic AI solutions.

Industry-Ready: Prepare for global certifications and unlock opportunities in startups and freelance ventures within a year.

Future-Proof Your Career: Position yourself at the forefront of technological innovation, ensuring long-term career growth and relevance.

Join Us in Building the Future

As industries increasingly adopt Agentic AI to enhance productivity and operations, professionals skilled in this area are in high demand. Our program offers a unique opportunity to become an expert AI Agent and Humanoid Robotics Developer, positioning you at the forefront of this technological revolution.

View Certifications
View Offered Courses

Panaversity is a cloud-native learning platform for Agentic AI, robotics, and next-gen AI skills.

# Flagship Program
Curated Programs For The Modern Tech Era.
# Certified Agentic and Robotic AI Engineer
Embark on a transformative journey into the realm of Agentic Artificial Intelligence (AI) with our comprehensive program. Agentic AI refers to autonomous systems capable of making decisions and performing tasks without human intervention, revolutionizing industries by enhancing efficiency and innovation.
[View Offered Courses](https://panaversity.org/flagship-program/courses)[View Certifications](https://panaversity.org/certifications)
## Program Structure
The program spans one year, with flexibility to accelerate completion by enrolling in multiple courses per quarter. This program equips you with the skills to thrive in the age of Conversational, Generative, Agentic, and Physical AI. It is divided into two levels:
### Core Level
Foundation for AI professionals
Focuses on foundational concepts, enabling you to start working in the field upon completion.
Fundamental AI concepts and applications
Practical implementation skills
Industry-ready portfolio projects
### Professional Level
Advanced specialization
Delves into advanced topics, allowing you to continue your studies while gaining practical experience.
Specialized AI domains and techniques
Advanced implementation strategies
Industry mentorship and networking
Interactive Learning Path
## Your Learning Journey
From foundational knowledge to startup creation, follow our structured path to mastering AI and Python development.
1
### Develop and Share Open-Source Textbooks
Create up-to-date, comprehensive textbooks on modern AI and Python, hosted on GitHub for global access and collaboration.
2
### Learn from Panaversity Teaching Agents
Agents are under development which will interact with you and teach and monitor your progress.
3
### Engage with Certification Quizzes
Design Level 1 and Level 2 quizzes based on the textbooks, hosted on GitHub. All students begin their journey by taking the Level 1 Certification exam to build foundational knowledge.
4
### Foster Practical Skills through Hackathons
Organize monthly, day-long hackathons focused on agentic AI development, enabling students to build robust project portfolios and gain real-world experience.
5
### Achieve Agentic AI Certification
Ensure all students and faculty members earn certifications to validate their skills and knowledge.
6
### Launch Startups with Mentorship
Guide senior students to become startup founders, working directly under Zia Khan's mentorship to develop and launch professional projects in the global marketplace.
## What You'll Learn
Master the technologies that will shape the future of AI and robotics
### Program Modules
AgenticDACAPhysicalCloud-NativeFine-Tuning
### Agentic Systems
### Agentic Systems
Master the design and orchestration of AI agents to perform complex tasks, leveraging frameworks for intelligent automation and collaboration.
Start with OpenAI Responses API and Agents SDK, progressing to advanced multi-agent frameworks for scalable solutions.
#### Key Skills You'll Develop
  * Agent Orchestration
  * Multi-Agent Collaboration
  * Process Automation


#### Tools & Technologies
OpenAI Agents SDK
AutoGen
LangChain
## Our Progressive Teaching Approach
Panaversity's innovative strategy for effective learning
### Foundation Building
Start with the fundamentals of Agentic AI, including OpenAI Responses API and Agents SDK. Build a solid conceptual base in multi-agent systems, cloud-native architecture, and intelligent dialogues—the foundation of the Agentia era.
### Practical Application
Apply your knowledge through hands-on projects focused on designing and deploying AI Agents. Work with real-world use cases in multi-agent orchestration, knowledge graphs, and cloud-based agentic systems.
### Specialization
Dive deeper into vertical LLM agents, Physical AI, and humanoid robotics. Choose from advanced topics aligned with your career goals—ranging from distributed AI systems to BDD-driven AI solution design.
### Industry Integration
Collaborate with industry partners through capstone projects, internships, and real-world deployments. Start freelancing or contributing to live agentic systems while continuing your professional-level coursework.
## Imagine A World Where Everything Is An AI Agent
A future where intelligent systems seamlessly collaborate, learn, and evolve to create a more connected and responsive world.
### Ubiquitous Intelligence
Smart homes, autonomous vehicles, adaptive businesses, and responsive urban infrastructure all functioning as independent yet collaborative intelligent agents.
### Agentic Communication
REST APIs become obsolete, replaced by fluid, context-aware agent-to-agent conversations using advanced Large Language Models.
### Physical Embodiment
Digital intelligence meets physical reality through humanoid robots and Physical AI to interact naturally with humans and the physical world.
### Intelligent Dialogues
Agents engage in deep, meaningful interactions, comprehending context, intent, nuance, and complexities far beyond basic endpoint invocations.
## Why This Program?
Cutting-Edge Skills: Stay ahead in the rapidly evolving tech landscape by mastering in-demand skills to build and deploy intelligent, scalable Agentic AI solutions.
Industry-Ready: Prepare for global certifications and unlock opportunities in startups and freelance ventures within a year.
Future-Proof Your Career: Position yourself at the forefront of technological innovation, ensuring long-term career growth and relevance.
## Join Us in Building the Future
As industries increasingly adopt Agentic AI to enhance productivity and operations, professionals skilled in this area are in high demand. Our program offers a unique opportunity to become an expert AI Agent and Humanoid Robotics Developer, positioning you at the forefront of this technological revolution.
